argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ellspd.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` M ) |
| 2 |  | ellspd.v | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 3 |  | ellspd.k | |- K = ( Base ` S ) |
| 4 |  | ellspd.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` M ) |
| 5 |  | ellspd.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` S ) |
| 6 |  | ellspd.t | |- .x. = ( .s ` M ) |
| 7 |  | elfilspd.f | |- ( ph -> F : I --> B ) |
| 8 |  | elfilspd.m | |- ( ph -> M e. LMod ) |
| 9 |  | elfilspd.i | |- ( ph -> I e. Fin ) |
| 10 |  | #P_elex | |- ( I e. Fin -> I e. _V ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> I e. _V ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11 | #P_ellspd | |- ( ph -> ( X e. ( N ` ( F " I ) ) <-> E. f e. ( K ^m I ) ( f finSupp .0. /\ X = ( M gsum ( f oF .x. F ) ) ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_elmapi | |- ( f e. ( K ^m I ) -> f : I --> K ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ f e. ( K ^m I ) ) -> f : I --> K ) |
| 15 | 9 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ f e. ( K ^m I ) ) -> I e. Fin ) |
| 16 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` S ) e. _V |
| 17 | 5, 16 | #P_eqeltri | |- .0. e. _V |
| 18 | 17 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ph /\ f e. ( K ^m I ) ) -> .0. e. _V ) |
| 19 | 14, 15, 18 | #P_fdmfifsupp | |- ( ( ph /\ f e. ( K ^m I ) ) -> f finSupp .0. ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_biantrurd | |- ( ( ph /\ f e. ( K ^m I ) ) -> ( X = ( M gsum ( f oF .x. F ) ) <-> ( f finSupp .0. /\ X = ( M gsum ( f oF .x. F ) ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_rexbidva | |- ( ph -> ( E. f e. ( K ^m I ) X = ( M gsum ( f oF .x. F ) ) <-> E. f e. ( K ^m I ) ( f finSupp .0. /\ X = ( M gsum ( f oF .x. F ) ) ) ) ) |
| 22 | 12, 21 | #P_bitr4d | |- ( ph -> ( X e. ( N ` ( F " I ) ) <-> E. f e. ( K ^m I ) X = ( M gsum ( f oF .x. F ) ) ) ) |
